settings.head: Share the Gutly love
settings.para: Our referral program is all about sharing the goodness with your friends and family. When you refer someone to Gutly, both you and your referral will be rewarded with exclusive perks and rewards.

settings.rfPara: Share your new favorite supplements with friend by inviting them to join Gutlyâ€™s community with your referral link.
Encourage your friends to make their first purchase using your unique referral link to enjoy exciting benefits!
You both will receive $20 credits towards your next purchase as a token for being part of the Gutly family. Happy referring!

settings.head: Get $20 off
settings.para1: Send your friend $20 off their first order, and get a $20 credit after each purchase.
settings.para2: Enter your info to generate a special sharing link, just for you.
settings.bottomPara: *Offer valid only for new customers, excluding subscription offers. By accepting this offer you agree to the Terms of Services and Privacy Policy.
